{"step_by_step_thinking": "The question asks if αCGRP is a member of the CGRP family. Document [31] clearly states that CGRP consists of 37 amino acids and exists in two forms termed α-CGRP and β-CGRP, which are derived from separate genes and differ by three amino acids but exhibit similar biological activity. This indicates that αCGRP is indeed a member of the CGRP family.", "answer_choice": "A"}
